name: GetVocal
tag_list: ruby-on-rails, voip, communications, ecommerce, community, web2-0
overview:
GetVocal inc. is a communications company focused on bringing next generation communication and community sites to the internet. A few of their projects include:

Surf-by-Tel (http://surfbytel.com) - This technology transcodes HTML Web pages and RSS feeds to VoiceXML and visa versa to deliver speech recognition and text-to-speech technology to enable callers to surf the web using any telephone and their voice! This technology is perfect for mobile professionals and the visually impaired. Surf-by-Tel also supports MP3 files to allow your callers to listen to podcasts and music over the telephone or VoIP connection - even live streaming events!

Gospelr (http://gospelr.com) - Christian community integrated with Twitter for social bible studies.

73s (http://73s.com) - Community for ham radio enthusiasts. Tweet for your ham radio, share QSO logs, post and review gear updates, and more.

Spree.ly (http://spree.ly) - Social shopping technology allows you to shop with friends online!

milestones.description: GetVocal Launches Teleku (new cloud-based telecom company delivering Phone Web Service APIs to Web developers allowing them to easily build and host Voice and SMS phone applications.)
Teleku partners with I6NET to deliver Asterisk support of PhoneML and TwiML cloud-based telephony solutions
milestones.source_description: Getvocal and I6net Partner to Bring Teleku to Asterisk
